revised_title: On the Axes of Elasticity and Crystalline Forms in Solids
tldr: The author investigates the axes of elasticity and crystalline forms in solids, introducing the concepts of orthotatic and heterotatic axes, and proposing a classification and nomenclature of their degrees and kinds of symmetry. The study also explores the potential energy of elasticity, homotatic coefficients, and the relationship between the laws of solid elasticity and the wave theory of light.
